card.description: A survey from FiveThrityEight, asking people across the United States what foods they have for Thanksgiving dinner.

context.potentialUses: Predict whether someone will have a specific food for Thanksgiving, based on the region of the country they are from.
context.potentialMisuses: Trying to guess what region someone is from, just based on the foods they eat on Thanksgiving.

Main dish.description: The main dish served at the meal. Most likely turkey.

Main dish cooking method.description: How the main dish was cooked, e.g. baked, roasted, fried.

Stuffing base.description: If stuffing was served, what its major ingredient was, or none if no stuffing was served.

Cranberry sauce.description: The kind of cranberry sauce served.

Gravy.description: Whether or not gravy was served with the meal.

Brussel sprouts.description: Whether or not brussel sprouts were served with the meal.

Carrots.description: Whether or not carrots were served with the meal.

Cauliflower.description: Whether or not cauliflower was served with the meal.

Corn.description: Whether or not corn was served with the meal.

Cornbread.description: Whether or not cornbread was served with the meal.

Fruit salad.description: Whether or not fruit salad was served with the meal.

Green beans/green bean casserole.description: Whether or not a dish with green beans was served with the meal.

Mac and cheese.description: Whether or not mac and cheese was served with the meal.

Mashed potatoes.description: Whether or not mashed potatoes were served with the meal.

Rolls/biscuits.description: Whether or not rolls or biscuits were served with the meal.

Squash.description: Whether or not squash was served with the meal.

Vegetable salad.description: Whether or not vegetable salad was served with the meal.

Yams/sweet potato casserole.description: Whether or not yam casserole or sweet potato casserole was served with the meal.

Apple pie.description: Whether or not apple pie was served as a dessert.

Buttermilk pie.description: Whether or not buttermilk pie was served as a dessert.

Cherry pie.description: Whether or not cherry pie was served as a dessert.

Chocolate pie.description: Whether or not chocolate pie was served as a dessert.

Coconut cream pie.description: Whether or not coconut cream pie was served as a dessert.

Key lime pie.description: Whether or not key lime pie was served as a dessert.

Peach pie.description: Whether or not peach pie was served as a dessert.

Pecan pie.description: Whether or not pecan pie was served as a dessert.

Pumpkin pie.description: Whether or not pumpkin pie was served as a dessert.

Sweet potato pie.description: Whether or not sweet potato pie was served as a dessert.

Apple cobbler.description: Whether or not apple cobbler was served as a dessert.

Blondies.description: Whether or not blondies were served as a dessert.

Brownies.description: Whether or not brownies were served as a dessert.

Carrot cake.description: Whether or not carrot cake was served as a dessert.

Cheesecake.description: Whether or not cheese cake was served as a dessert.

Cookies.description: Whether or not cookies were served as a dessert.

Fudge.description: Whether or not fudge was served as a dessert.

Ice cream.description: Whether or not ice cream was served as a dessert.

Peach cobbler.description: Whether or not peach cobbler was served as a dessert.

US region.description: The part of the country the participant was from.
